steps: step 2: Login at https://testops.staging.katalon.com/login --> navigate to Page_home
step 3: At Page_home click on hyperlink_executions --> navigate to Page_project
step 4: At Page_project click on hyperlink_releases --> navigate to Page_releases
step 5: At Page_releases click on hyperlink_menu_visual_testing --> navigate to Page_katalon-eyes
step 6: At Page_katalon-eyes click on hyperlink_menu_reports --> navigate to Page_overview
step 7: At Page_overview click on hyperlink_test_planning --> navigate to Page_test-planning
step 8: Add visual checkpoint at Page_test-planning
